description: "Map of Asia, with mainland Southeast Asia in red and divided into ancient kingdoms, Sunda Islands in yellow, and the Philippines in grey. Twelve different scales are shown, as different countries used different measurement systems."
title: "Charte von Asien : nach den bewährtesten astronomischen Beobachtungen den neuesten Reisen, und den vorzüglichsten Charten, insonderheit aber der Geographie de Hrn I.C. Gatterers. gemäss"
